name: Saving Sunny
description:
Saving Sunny is my submission for Ludum Dare 46!

In Saving Sunny, you play a young kid who is awoken one night by an explosion at the Perseus Corporation Manufacturing Facility. Always curious, you leave your home and enter the Perseus Perimeter, a restricted zone around the facility. What you find there will make this a Summer you'll never forget...

---

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • X: Jump
  • C: Call, Pickup, Throw

---

I didn't get to make many levels and I have a ton more ideas for areas and content, but I hope you like the core mechanic and will consider voting for me in Ludum Dare 46! Either way, thank you so much for playing!
